title: Adobe Acrobat Pro DC 2015.016.20039 Multilingual
description:
Adobe Acrobat Pro DC 2015.016.20039 Multilingual
[Updated: 05/10/2016]


All-new Adobe Acrobat Pro DC with Adobe Document Cloud services is here. Completely reimagined PDF tools let you create, edit, sign, and track PDFs from anywhere. It will change the way you work with design layouts, press-ready files, and all your important documents forever.	

In this version:
- Access powerful print production and digital publishing tools. Preview, preflight, correct, and prepare PDF files.
- Work anywhere. Create, export, and sign PDFs from your computer or the Acrobat DC mobile app.
- Take your files with you. Use Mobile Link to access recent files across desktop, web, and mobile.
- Edit anything. Instantly edit PDFs and scanned documents â€” as naturally as any other file.
- Make last-minute changes. Edit text and organize PDF pages on your iPad.
- Replace ink signatures. Send, track, manage, and store signed documents with a built-in e-signature service.
- Protect important documents. Prevent others from copying or editing sensitive information in PDFs.
- Eliminate overnight envelopes. Send, track, and confirm delivery of documents electronically.

System Requirements:

â— 1.5GHz or faster processor
â— Windows Server 2008 R2 (64 bit), 2012 (64 bit), or 2012 R2 (64 bit);
Windows 7 (32 bit and 64 bit);
Windows 8, 8.1 (32 bit and 64 bit);
Windows 10 (32 bit and 64 bit)
â— 1GB of RAM
â— 4.5GB of available hard-disk space
â— 1024x768 screen resolution
â— Internet Explorer 8, 9, 10 or 11; Firefox (ESR)
â— Video hardware acceleration (optional)

These requirements apply to the Acrobat Pro DC subscription plan,
and are in addition to the requirements listed above.
â— Microsoft Windows 10 using Internet Explorer 11, Firefox, or Chrome
â— Microsoft Windows 8 using Internet Explorer 10 or later, Firefox, or Chrome
â— Microsoft Windows 7 using Internet Explorer 8 or later, Firefox, or Chrome
â— Microsoft Windows Vista using Internet Explorer 8 or 9, Firefox, or Chrome

The Acrobat DC desktop app is available in the following languages:-
English

French

German


Brazilian Portuguese

Swedish

Danish

Finnish

Norwegian

Simplified Chinese

Traditional Chinese

Korean

Czech

Polish


Slovenianâ€ 

North African French â€¡

Middle Eastern Hebrew Â§

Release notes:-
â— Release date: May 4, 2016

â— Last updated: May 10, 2016

â— Platform: Windows and Macintosh.

Summary
Adobe has released security updates for Adobe Acrobat and Reader for Windows and Macintosh.
These updates address critical vulnerabilities that could potentially allow an attacker to
take control of the affected system
